text: Alexandra Föderl-Schmid (born 30 January 1971) is an Austrian journalist. She has been the chief editor of the newspaper Der Standard since 2007. She began working at the newspaper in 1990. She has been the newspaper's Germany on-the- scene reporter and Brussels-based European Union on-the-scene reporter. Föderl-Schmid was born in Haslach an der Mühl, Upper Austria. She studied at the University of Salzburg. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian journalists Category:People from Upper Austria
title: Alexandra Föderl-Schmid
